description: Dialog to set up one-time time-based passwords for a user

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether to disable the submit button

props.name: icon
props.description: The icon type for the submit button

props.name: theme
props.description: The theme of the submit button

props.name: empty
props.description: Empty state message if no fields are defined

props.name: novalidate
props.description:
Skip client side validation (vuelidate).
Validation is skipped by default in
dialogs. Native input validation still works though.

props.name: value
props.description: An object with all values for the fields

props.name: qr
props.description: SVG element for QR code containing TOTP secret

events.name: submit
events.description: The submit button is clicked or the form is submitted.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Triggers the `@cancel` event and closes the dialog.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Triggers the `@close` event and closes the dialog.

methods.name: focus
methods.description:
Sets the focus on the first usable input
or a given input by name

methods.name: open
methods.description:
Opens the dialog and triggers the `@open` event.
Use ready to fire events that should be run as
soon as the dialog is open
